column1: {{rfd links|1=Property:P802|2=same as for {{P|185}}: generally too many, and redundant with the reverse property. The most prominent students could be referenced with {{P|3342}} instead.}} Same as for {{P|185}}: generally too many, and redundant with the reverse property. The most prominent students could be referenced with {{P|3342}} (and a [[Property:P2868|role]] qualified as {{Q|48282}}) instead. —[[User:Nomen ad hoc|Nomen ad hoc]] ([[User talk:Nomen ad hoc|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:38, 28 July 2019 (UTC)
*{{vd}} per nomination. [[User:Nomen ad hoc|Nomen ad hoc]] ([[User talk:Nomen ad hoc|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:39, 28 July 2019 (UTC)

. *{{vd}} Idem. {{P|802}} was originally supposed to keep only the main students but has been used in practice as an inverse property for {{P|1066}} (notably after the inception of an inverse contraint). I agree that using the property properly wasn't that obvious (sources rarely differentiate the main and secondary students of a person). Anyway, it is currently cumbersome to maintain and do not bring anything new. [[User:Alexander Doria|Alexander Doria]] ([[User talk:Alexander Doria|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:47, 29 July 2019 (UTC)
*{{vd}} - [[User:Premeditated|Premeditated]] ([[User talk:Premeditated|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 07:55, 5 August 2019 (UTC)

*{{neutral}} leaning toward {{vd}} as it's indeed redundant wuth the inverse and it's a one-to-many relationship. Pinging the top 5 users of this property: {{ping|Simon Villeneuve|Yamaha5|Aiaiaiaiaia|Villy Fink Isaksen|AttoRenato}}. Cheers, [[User:VIGNERON|VIGNERON]] ([[User talk:VIGNERON|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 06:15, 8 August 2019 (UTC)

*: {{Ping|VIGNERON}} Is there any rule or recommendation against one-to-many or did I misunderstand why you mentioned that? I suppose {{P|P1066}} is also one-to-many (so actually I'd say the concepts are many-to-many). Removing {{P|P802}} would supposedly remove also [[Property:P1066#P1696|inverse claim]], but it should first be investigated what that claim means in machine understanding of the property. I think many properties do enforce inverse property today, and even if it's cumbersome to maintain it might be re-added later if we can't make clear why it shouldn't. [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 05:00, 17 October 2019 (UTC)

* {{neutral}} Will somebody move the present values of P802 to P3342 ?. We access to P802 in [[:ca:template:infotaula persona|template:infotaula persona]] of cawiki. I have no problem to change, but without lose the contents. Thanks,[[User:Amadalvarez|Amadalvarez]] ([[User talk:Amadalvarez|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 15:59, 12 August 2019 (UTC)
*: We would ask a bot. Cheers, [[User:Nomen ad hoc|Nomen ad hoc]] ([[User talk:Nomen ad hoc|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 16:12, 12 August 2019 (UTC)
. *::Let me know when this should be moved. I can create a script for this. [[User:Edoderoo|Edoderoo]] ([[User talk:Edoderoo|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 17:37, 18 August 2019 (UTC)

*::: Thanks dear Edoderoo. Well, when (and if) a reasonable consensus will be reached? Best, [[User:Nomen ad hoc|Nomen ad hoc]] ([[User talk:Nomen ad hoc|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:26, 18 August 2019 (UTC)

. *::::Right now, nobody is against deletion (if data is moved, which is an obvious requirement to me). Lets give it some time, it's holidays season, and there is no need to rush. [[User:Edoderoo|Edoderoo]] ([[User talk:Edoderoo|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:06, 19 August 2019 (UTC)
*::::: All right. [[User:Nomen ad hoc|Nomen ad hoc]] ([[User talk:Nomen ad hoc|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:17, 19 August 2019 (UTC)

. *::::::I assume that the data moved will incorporate a qualifier {{P|3831}} = {{q|Q48942}} or similar, because P3342 is a generic property and need the person role which is implicit in the P802. Thanks !,[[User:Amadalvarez|Amadalvarez]] ([[User talk:Amadalvarez|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:18, 31 August 2019 (UTC)

*: {{Ping|Nomen ad hoc}} Did I misunderstand that the proposition was mainly a means to remove the less prominent/relevant student-relations. Are you suggesting to move each current claim as a first step, to prevent new students added and the "relevance" evaluated over time, or that the evaluation of relevance performed before the move? Isn't the problem in that case that {{P|P1066}} will still be overused? *:: {{Ping|Nomen ad hoc}} Did you also have feedback on these questions? [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 16:49, 17 October 2019 (UTC)

*:{{Ping|Amadalvarez|Edoderoo}} When you say "without loss", are you disagreeing that the student property is overused or do you just want to make sure that the ''important students'' are not lost? Would it be feasible to use {{P|P1066}} in infobox if that was complete enough? [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 05:00, 17 October 2019 (UTC)

::*{{ping|Jagulin}} I understant this kind of properties actually mean "remarkable students", not "all the students in his/her whole life". So, if it has been overused, clean it is not a problem to me and even better for infoboxes, which must be a summary, not a list. However, may not be necessary to move to another property, but just clean it. My "do not lose" was refered to the effect of change the property, not to clean their not rellevant content. Thanks, [[User:Amadalvarez|Amadalvarez]] ([[User talk:Amadalvarez|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 07:18, 17 October 2019 (UTC)

* {{vd}}, but please make sure that no data is lost (including qualifiers and sources) during the transition. --[[User:Yair rand|Yair rand]] ([[User talk:Yair rand|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:44, 15 September 2019 (UTC)

*I made a request at [[WD:RBOT]], if there is no issue brought up I will do this task in the coming weeks, to finish this request afterwards. [[User:Edoderoo|Edoderoo]] ([[User talk:Edoderoo|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:49, 28 September 2019 (UTC)
*{{keep}} if it's meant to be moved to a property other than {{P|1066}}. --- [[User talk:Jura1|Jura]] 15:54, 28 September 2019 (UTC)

*: {{Ping|Jura1}} I think it has been assumed that the inverse property is already matching, but you have a point in that this should be confirmed first. Do you agree that {{P|P802}} has been overused (for non-relevant students) and should those "mistakes" be transferred to {{P|P1066}} by bot or removed first? I interpret your vote here as "moving to another claim will change nothing", but I'm unsure if you also mean "we should instead monitor data (e.g. relevance) and clarify the usage instructions" or "there is no problem with current usage". [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 05:00, 17 October 2019 (UTC)
*{{vd}} if moved to  {{P|1066}}. --- [[User talk:Jura1|Jura]] 15:54, 28 September 2019 (UTC)

* {{keep}} I base this on reading the discussions here. Currently it hasn't been made clear what removal of the property would solve. I've asked for clarifications which may change my view. Current position: Monitoring data relevancy is better than making the statements more complex as a means to get less data. If "inverse constraints" are not to be used (always cumbersome to maintain), that should probably be a bigger discussion rather than per property. [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 05:00, 17 October 2019 (UTC)

* '''Discuss''' {{Ping|Nomen ad hoc}} Did you already have a successful case with {{P|185}} to tell about? How did the community react to the change and what kind of bot-work was done? [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 05:00, 17 October 2019 (UTC)
*: Please see [[#Property:P185]] above. [[User:Nomen ad hoc|Nomen ad hoc]] ([[User talk:Nomen ad hoc|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 08:07, 17 October 2019 (UTC)
. *:: I see, so no experience yet. I suggest to not rush this change, but learn from PhD first. [[User:Jagulin|Jagulin]] ([[User talk:Jagulin|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 16:49, 17 October 2019 (UTC)

*{{keep}}: clearer relationship than anything else especially in relations from earlier centuries [[User:Palotabarát|Palotabarát]] ([[User talk:Palotabarát|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 10:39, 20 October 2019 (UTC)

*{{vd}} Clearly-than-god no consensus to keep such old-school schema. Replacement is now available. --[[User:Liuxinyu970226|Liuxinyu970226]] ([[User talk:Liuxinyu970226|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 04:54, 1 January 2020 (UTC)
*{{Vote_delete}} too many, information should be stored by inverse. [[User:Michael FV|Michael FV]] ([[User talk:Michael FV|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 03:16, 9 January 2020 (UTC)
* {{vk}} nghiên cứu sinh (doctoral student) is different by sinh viên (student) in Vietnamese. --[[Special:Contributions/117.136.54.109|117.136.54.109]] 23:11, 20 January 2020 (UTC)
: {{vk}} Has language conflicts. --[[Special:Contributions/111.32.68.231|111.32.68.231]] 02:39, 9 May 2020 (UTC)
*{{vd}} per nomination. --[[User:Tinker Bell|Tinker Bell]] [[User_talk:Tinker Bell|★]] [[Special:Contributions/Tinker Bell|♥]] 03:19, 20 May 2020 (UTC)
*{{vk}} Useful for historical people whose students are not PhD.--[[User:Midleading|Midleading]] ([[User talk:Midleading|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 04:20, 27 September 2020 (UTC)
* {{Keep}}, an important property for science.--[[User:Arbnos|Arbnos]] ([[User talk:Arbnos|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:58, 28 April 2021 (UTC)

* {{Keep}}, I watched {{Q|Q91092801}}, {{Statement|Naberius Kalego|P802|Iruma Suzuki|P69|Babyls Demon School}} and {{Statement|Iruma Suzuki|P1066|Naberius Kalego|P69|Babyls Demon School}} is valid statement--[[User:D2513850|林勇智]] 02:38, 2 May 2021 (UTC)

*{{Vote keep}} See my above comment at [[#demonym (P1549)]], or find a solution that covers usage on other projects like Wikipedia, namely templates and modules. --[[User:Amitie 10g|Amitie 10g]] ([[User talk:Amitie 10g|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 17:49, 29 May 2021 (UTC)
*{{Keep}} I use this property to record the apprenticeships of artists. - [[User:PKM|PKM]] ([[User talk:PKM|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 00:18, 15 October 2021 (UTC)

* {{Keep}} Important to have pupils and teachers on artist items. Many fuzzy attributions are based on these relationsips. [[User:Jane023|Jane023]] ([[User talk:Jane023|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:06, 21 October 2021 (UTC)
